languages.text: "Восстания мирян есть бунт неоптимальных инстинктов и желаний над предопределенной структурой. Случившееся есть результат недостаточной сервиторизации экипажа".
"Uprisings of the laity are the revolt of suboptimal instincts and desires against a predefined structure. This event is the result of insufficient servitorisation of the crew."
languages.original_text: "Восстания мирян есть бунт неоптимальных инстинктов и желаний над предопределенной структурой. Случившееся есть результат недостаточной сервиторизации экипажа".

traits.locale_text: "Uprisings of the laity are the revolt of suboptimal instincts and desires against a predefined structure. This event is the result of insufficient servitorisation of the crew."

traits.locale_text: "Uprisings of the laity are the revolt of suboptimal instincts and desires against a predefined structure. This event is the result of insufficient servitorisation of the crew."

languages.text: “乌合之众暴动的本质，源于存在缺陷的本能，以及反抗预定结构的渴望。这起事件的起因，就是因为还有太多船员没有被改造为机仆。”
languages.original_text: "Uprisings of the laity are the revolt of suboptimal instincts and desires against a predefined structure. This event is the result of insufficient servitorisation of the crew."

traits.locale_text: “乌合之众暴动的本质，源于存在缺陷的本能，以及反抗预定结构的渴望。这起事件的起因，就是因为还有太多船员没有被改造为奴工。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Les profanes se révoltent pour satisfaire leurs instincts primaires suboptimaux et leur désir profond de se rebeller contre une structure prédéfinie. C'est le résultat d'une servitorisation insuffisante de l'équipage. »
languages.original_text: "Uprisings of the laity are the revolt of suboptimal instincts and desires against a predefined structure. This event is the result of insufficient servitorisation of the crew."

traits.locale_text: « Les profanes se révoltent pour satisfaire leurs instincts primaires suboptimaux et leur désir profond de se rebeller contre une structure prédéfinie. C'est le résultat d'une servitorisation insuffisante de l'équipage. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ein Aufstand des Laientums ist die Revolte suboptimaler Instinkte und Begierden gegen eine vorgegebene Struktur. Dieses Ereignis ist das Resultat unzulänglicher Servitorisierung der Crew."
languages.original_text: "Uprisings of the laity are the revolt of suboptimal instincts and desires against a predefined structure. This event is the result of insufficient servitorisation of the crew."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Aufstand des Laientums ist die Revolte suboptimaler Instinkte und Begierden gegen eine vorgegebene Struktur. Dieses Ereignis ist das Resultat unzulänglicher Servitorisierung der Crew."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「素人の暴動とは、所定の構造に逆らおうとする潜在的な本能と欲求が生んだ抵抗だ。本件は乗組員の従僕精神の不足が原因である」
languages.original_text: "Uprisings of the laity are the revolt of suboptimal instincts and desires against a predefined structure. This event is the result of insufficient servitorisation of the crew."

traits.locale_text: 「素人の暴動とは、所定の構造に逆らおうとする潜在的な本能と欲求が生んだ抵抗だ。本件は乗組員の従僕精神の不足が原因である」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Los alzamientos de los laicos son la rebelión de instintos y deseos subóptimos contra el orden predefinido. Este suceso podría haberse evitado con un mayor índice de servidorización».
languages.original_text: "Uprisings of the laity are the revolt of suboptimal instincts and desires against a predefined structure. This event is the result of insufficient servitorisation of the crew."

traits.locale_text: «Los alzamientos de los laicos son la rebelión de instintos y deseos subóptimos contra el orden predefinido. Este suceso podría haberse evitado con un mayor índice de servidorización».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Kutsallıktan ırak olanların isyanı, yetersiz içsel dürtünün ve köklü düzene karşı duyulan nefretin yansımasıdır. Bu hadise, mürettebatın hizmetörsüzlüğünden doğmuştur."
languages.original_text: "Uprisings of the laity are the revolt of suboptimal instincts and desires against a predefined structure. This event is the result of insufficient servitorisation of the crew."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsallıktan ırak olanların isyanı, yetersiz içsel dürtünün ve köklü düzene karşı duyulan nefretin yansımasıdır. Bu hadise, mürettebatın servitörsüzlüğünden doğmuştur."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Uprisings of the laity are the revolt of suboptimal instincts and desires against a predefined structure. This event is the result of insufficient servitorisation of the crew."
